page.title: 12WARDOUR SCHOOL MEADOW
page.content:
{ }These are the plants we found in Wardour school meadow: { Abundant:-}ordinary grass, buttercup, dandelion, red fescue. { Frequent:-}sweet vernal grass, clover hawkbits, yarrow, hogweed. { Occasional:-}ribwort plantain, field wood rush, moss. { Rare:-}common mouse ear, reed grass, Germander speedwell.
We did this by throwing hoops and counting the number of plants in each. This was not easy because some plants were quite difficult to identify.There were no{dominant}species. Miss Osbourn helped us to do this.
{ Lucy Joanna
